timeline.description: Started Data Engineering Internship at Samsung Research Canada
Started as a Machine Learning Engineer Intern at WorkSafeBc's Innovation Team.
Data Scientist and Software Development Intern at BetterCart.
Awarded 2nd place for the Technical Solutions category at the SFU Business Analytics Hackathon.
Worked as a Junior Data Scientist Intern for the CBSA where I implemented a model for Language Identification. Moreover, I contributed to a COVID-19 related project.
Participated in the BC Student AI Showcase where I presented a multi-target classification model for categorizing toxic comments.

I was a Parliamentary Intern for the Government of Canada where I worked closely with an MP to develop briefings, questions, assisted with public affairs, and contributed to International Relations research.
Instructed a class on Java and OOP concepts for ~60 students in association with Illuminate.
Started Jazz Performance undergraduate studies at the University of Toronto.
